about_the_game:
Attention: We are currently updating the game to Unreal Engine 5.4 and expect to show you a demo in a couple months.

In Viking Norse Mythology there are 9 realms.

Jotunheim: Home of the Giants
Asgard: Home of the Gods
Niflheim: The Realm of Fog and Mist
Muspelheim: The Land of Fire
Midgard: Home of the Humans
Vanaheim: Home of the Vanir
Alfheim: Home of the Light Elves
Svartalfheim: Home of the Dwarves
Helheim: Home of the dead

The Norse Gods lived in the Asgard realm. The shields of each realm have been stolen from Asgard. Odin has chosen you to travel to Jotunheim where your first journey takes you.

Semi Open World Full of Danger

Explore the vast world of Jotunheim where there are 3 regions. Within each region there are dangerous dungeons to explore and enemies to defeat.

Snow Region

The region to the west has large mountains where snow and winter never stop. You must travel the open land and defeat the frost giant.

Dark Forest Region

This region is to the east with large dark forests. You must explore the area and defeat the forest giant that rules the region.

Build Your Character

While exploring the vast regions; you collect Vaettir from each enemy defeated. Within these regions there are Shield Maiden checkpoints. You can rest at these areas and spend Vaettir to make your character stronger to defeat harder enemies. You can increase your health and make yourself harder to kill or build more strength and do more damage. You can also level up your potion skill so health, stamina and more have a bigger impact.

Great Story Line

As you travel through the realms picking up quests playing through a storyline of how the Vikings saw these amazing realms.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence and gore when attacking enemies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gefore GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX Vega
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: The shields of Asgard have been stolen. You have been chosen by Odin to retrieve them. Your first journey takes you to Jotunheim. Travel the vast deep and dark forests. Climb mountains where winter never stops. Fight challenging enemies.
